import React, { useState } from "react" import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" import { Col, Button, Row, Container, Card, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import axios from "axios" // import isUrlHttp from 'is-url-http'; import Copy from "./Copy" function UrlArea() { const [url, setUrl] = useState(''); const [shortenUrl, setshortenUrl] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:8080/generateUrl', {url}, { responseType: 'json' }); setshortenUrl(response.data) setUrl("") }; return (

URL SH.RTNE.

setUrl(e.target.value)} />

{shortenUrl }

 ) } export default UrlArea;
